page.title: 19A DAY IN MY LIFE (CONTINUED)
page.content: baked beans on toast,with Mum and my brother Philip.Dad goes back to work. He is a farmworker. After dinner,we all go outside to play racing on our bicycles,usually with our next door neighbour,Andrew. Then we go inside to watch the Saturday afternoon film.Afterwards we go to the shop to get our sweets.We play out in the field with the dog and Mum calls us in at about 17.00. When Dad gets home we have our tea.We have pork chops.After that we watch television till about 20.45.,then we go to bed. In bed,I look around at things then I close my eyes and I'm asleep.And that is the end of a day in my life. Donna Knight,aged 9.
